bug.author: holdenk
bug.summary: Building with `all=-N` tries to overwrite files in go installation
bug.description:
We can just build with all=-N appears to try and rebuild go core libraries without optimizations resulting in permission denied errors when not running as root.
make build-kfctl go build -i -gcflags 'all=-N -l' -ldflags "-X main.VERSION=v0-164-g390a3381" -o bin/kfctl cmd/kfctl/main.go go build errors: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/errors.a: permission denied go build runtime/internal/atomic: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/runtime/internal/atomic.a: permission denied go build internal/cpu: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/internal/cpu.a: permission denied go build math/bits: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/math/bits.a: permission denied go build runtime/internal/sys: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/runtime/internal/sys.a: permission denied go build internal/race: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/internal/race.a: permission denied go build unicode/utf8: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/unicode/utf8.a: permission denied go build sync/atomic: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/sync/atomic.a: permission denied go build encoding: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/encoding.a: permission denied go build unicode/utf16: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/unicode/utf16.a: permission denied go build container/list: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/container/list.a: permission denied go build unicode: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/unicode.a: permission denied go build crypto/internal/subtle: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/crypto/internal/subtle.a: permission denied go build internal/x/crypto/cryptobyte/asn1: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/internal/x/crypto/cryptobyte/asn1.a: permission denied go build crypto/subtle: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/crypto/subtle.a: permission denied go build internal/nettrace: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/internal/nettrace.a: permission denied go build runtime/cgo: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/runtime/cgo.a: permission denied go build internal/x/crypto/curve25519: open /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/internal/x/crypto/curve25519.a: permission denied make: *** [Makefile:91: build-kfctl] Error 1
Instead we can try building with -N instead of all=-N.
make build-kfctl && echo $? go build -i -gcflags '-N -l' -ldflags "-X main.VERSION=v0-164-g390a3381" -o bin/kfctl cmd/kfctl/main.go 0
